Description:
This talk will highlight two different oncology research applications for Roche’s new Digital Light Cycler®
decry System. First, Yu Zhao (Roche) will describe the DNA methylation analysis of the RASSF1A
promoter in cancer cell lines; this assay enables precise detection and absolute quantification without
requiring bisulfite conversion or reference standards.  Then, GT Molecular will discuss a new AML
research panel developed for the Digital Light Cycler®; this assay enables sensitive detection of AML-
associated variants using DNA extracted from liquid biopsy samples while leveraging the clinical utility of
the Digital Light Cycler® decry System.
Location: Spotlight Theater A - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
